welcome.new_user: Welcome to the IELTS Mentor Bot, {first_name}! Your journey to IELTS success starts now. Your preferred language is set to English.
welcome.returning_user: Welcome back, {first_name}! Let's continue preparing for the IELTS.

practice.select_section: Please select a section to practice:
practice.session_wip: Practice sessions for {section} are still under development. Please check back later!

ai.explain_prompt: What IELTS topic or grammar point would you like me to explain?
ai.define_prompt: What word would you like me to define?

stats.no_stats: You don't have any stats yet. Try a /practice session to get started!

teacher.create_group_start: To create a group, please reply with the group name.
teacher.create_group_ask_description: Excellent! Now, please provide a short description for the group.
teacher.create_group_invalid_name: Invalid name. Please provide a name that is at least 3 characters long.
teacher.my_exercises_wip: The /my_exercises command is under construction. Soon you'll be able to see and manage your exercises here.
teacher.my_exercises_none: You have not created any exercises yet. Use /create_exercise to begin.

errors.general_error: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later.
errors.unknown_command: Sorry, I didn't understand that command. Type /help to see the list of available commands.
errors.user_not_found: Could not find your user profile. Please use /start to register.
errors.permission_denied_teacher: This command is only available to approved teachers.

teacher_exercise.create_exercise_title_prompt: Let's create a new exercise. First, what is the title?
teacher_exercise.create_exercise_description_prompt: Great. Now, provide a brief description for the exercise.
teacher_exercise.create_exercise_type_prompt: Got it. What type of exercise is this? (e.g., Vocabulary, Grammar, Reading)
teacher_exercise.create_exercise_difficulty_prompt: Excellent. What is the difficulty level? (e.g., Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced)
teacher_exercise.create_exercise_content_prompt: Almost done. Please provide the exercise content in JSON format. For example: `{\"questions\": [{\"text\": \"...\", \"answer\": \"...\"}]}`
teacher_exercise.create_exercise_invalid_json: The content provided is not valid JSON. Please check the format and try again.
teacher_exercise.speaking_practice_intro: Welcome to Speaking Practice! Please choose a part to begin.
teacher_exercise.please_send_voice_response: Please send me your response as a voice message.
teacher_exercise.please_send_voice_message_prompt: This step requires a voice message. Please send your response as a voice recording.
teacher_exercise.processing_voice_message: Thank you. Processing your voice message now...
teacher_exercise.error_processing_voice: Sorry, there was an error processing your voice message. Please try again later.
teacher_exercise.speaking_practice_completed: Speaking practice for this question is complete. You can start a new practice anytime.
teacher_exercise.error_formatting_feedback: Sorry, there was an error formatting your feedback.
teacher_exercise.feature_not_implemented: This feature is not yet implemented. Please select another option.
